definition: A day of the week that falls between Tuesday and Thursday, commonly used to refer to the fourth day of the standard seven-day week.

examples.german: Am Mittwoch habe ich einen Arzttermin.
examples.english: I have a doctor's appointment on Wednesday.

examples.german: Mittwoch ist der dritte Tag der Woche.
examples.english: Wednesday is the third day of the week.

examples.german: Der Mittwoch ist oft der stressigste Tag.
examples.english: Wednesday is often the busiest day.
